item.title: 自定义动态数组
item.description: public class Array { private int[] data; private int size; public Array(int capacity) { data =new int[capacity]; size=0; } public Array() { this(10); } public int getSize() { return size; } public int getCapacity() { return data.length; } public boolean isEmpty() { return size==0; } //在末尾加入一个元素 public void addlist(int e) { if(size==data.length) { throw new IllegalArgumentException("AddLast failed.Array is full."); }else { data[size]=e; size++; } } //在开头加入一个元素 public void addFirst(int e) { add(0,e); } //在数组指定位置加入一个数组 public void add(int index,int e) { if(size==data.
